trans-unit.source: Represents a custom binding element that supports channel security using asymmetric encryption.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en egendefinert binding-elementet som støtter kanal sikkerhet bruker asymmetrisk kryptering.

trans-unit.source: This binding element signs the message using the sender's authentication token and encrypts the message using the recipient's token.
trans-unit.target: Bindingselementet signerer meldingen i avsenderens Godkjenningstoken og krypterer meldingen med mottakerens-token.

trans-unit.source: A custom binding contains a collection of binding elements arranged in a specific order: the element that represents the top of the binding stack is added first, the next element down in the binding stack, is added second, and so forth.
trans-unit.target: En egendefinert binding inneholder en samling av binding elementer som er ordnet i en bestemt rekkefølge: element som representerer øverst i bindingen bunken legges først, neste element ned i bindingen-stakken er lagt til andre, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: To add this class to a binding 1.
trans-unit.target: Å legge til denne klassen i en binding 1.

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Opprett en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Create custom binding elements that is above this binding element in the binding stack, such as the optional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Opprett egendefinerte bindingen elementer som er over denne bindingselementet i for eksempel valgfrie <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ReliableSessionBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransactionFlowBindingElement> stakken binding

trans-unit.source: Add the created elements in the preceding order to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Legge til elementer som er opprettet i foregående rekkefølgen som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>ved hjelp av den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection.InsertItem%28System.Int32%2CSystem.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement%29> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection>

trans-unit.source: Create an instance of AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement and add it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Opprette en forekomst av AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement og legge den til i samlingen.

trans-unit.source: Add any additional custom binding elements to the collection, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: Legg til noen ekstra egendefinerte bindingen elementer i samlingen, for eksempel <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Before using this class, you should determine if a standard binding meets your security requirements.
trans-unit.target: Før du bruker denne klassen, må du finne ut om en standard binding oppfyller sikkerhetskravene til.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Once an instance of this object is created, you should treat the properties of its base class <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement> as immutable.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når en forekomst av dette objektet er opprettet, bør du behandle egenskaper for basisklassen <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>som uforanderlig.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Calling set on some properties may have unpredictable effects: the binding may behave as if the property retained its old value, with a run-time failure being the only indication of an issue.
trans-unit.target: Kaller som er angitt for noen egenskaper kan ha uforutsigbare effekter: bindingen kan fungere som om egenskapen beholdes den gamle verdien med en kjøretid feil som bare indikasjon på et problem.

trans-unit.source: Two properties known to behave this way are <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: To er kjent fungerer på denne måten <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.SecurityBindingElement.MessageSecurityVersion%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.IssuedSecurityTokenParameters.KeyType%2A>

trans-unit.source: There may be other properties this is true of.
trans-unit.target: Det kan være andre egenskaper dette gjelder for.

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en forekomst av denne klassen.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Følgende medlemmer som er angitt av denne konstruktøren: | Medlemmet | Verdien | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> with the specified recipient token parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> med de angitte mottakeren token.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`recipientTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Følgende medlemmer som er angitt av denne konstruktøren: | Medlemmet | Verdien | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `recipientTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the recipient (for example, the server's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Definerer tokenet for mottakeren (for eksempel X.509 serversertifikatet).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> with the specified recipient and initiator token parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> med de angitte mottakeren og oppretter token.

trans-unit.source: The following members are set by this constructor: |Member|Value| |------------|-----------| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>|<xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>|`initiatorTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>|`recipientTokenParameters`| |<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>|`false`|
trans-unit.target: Følgende medlemmer som er angitt av denne konstruktøren: | Medlemmet | Verdien | |------------|-----------| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>| <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A>| `initiatorTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>| `recipientTokenParameters`| | <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A>| `false`|</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.AllowSerializedSigningTokenOnReply%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A></xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder></xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the recipient (for example the server's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Definerer tokenet for mottakeren (for eksempel X.509 serversertifikatet).

trans-unit.source: Defines the token for the initiator (for example, the client's X.509 certificate).
trans-unit.target: Definerer tokenet for oppretteren (for eksempel X.509 klientsertifikatet).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether serializing a signing token on a reply message is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om serialisering av et signering token på en svarmelding er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: This flag is intended to enable interoperability with some older implementations of WS-Security (for example, WSE 2.0).
trans-unit.target: Dette flagget er ment å aktivere samhandling med en eldre implementeringer av WS-Security (for eksempel WSE 2.0).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if serializing a signing token on a reply message is allowed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis serialisering av en logger er token på en svarmelding tillatt. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of this class initialized from the current one.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av denne klassen er initialisert enn den gjeldende.

trans-unit.source: This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone.
trans-unit.target: Dette oppretter et fullstendig eksemplar av gjeldende bindingen elementet objekttreet, også kalt dype kloning.

trans-unit.source: A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object.
trans-unit.target: En dyp Klon av et objekt opprettes en kopi av objektet og en kopi av alt direkte eller indirekte referert til av objektet.

trans-unit.source: (This can also be described as copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element.
trans-unit.target: (Dette kan også angis som kopiering hele objektet diagrammet.) Returnerer en dyp Klon aktiverer kjøretiden støtte for tilfeller der flere egendefinerte bindinger dele et egendefinert binding-element.

trans-unit.source: If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke returneres en dyp Klon, er kjøretid virkemåten ikke definert.

trans-unit.source: A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only.
trans-unit.target: En grunn klone av et objekt er derimot en kopi av objektet bare.

trans-unit.source: If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
trans-unit.target: Hvis objektet inneholder referanser til andre objekter, oppretter ikke lite kopien kopier av henvises objekter. i stedet overfører den bare referanser til de opprinnelige objektene.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement> object with property values equal to those of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>objekt med verdier som er lik i den gjeldende forekomsten.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the token definition for the initiator.
trans-unit.target: Angir token definisjonen for oppretteren.

trans-unit.source: This property gets and sets a class that contains the properties for the token of the party that initiates communication.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen får eller angir en klasse som inneholder egenskapene for tokenet for part som starter kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> that holds the token definition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>som inneholder token definisjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the order of message encryption and signing for this binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir rekkefølgen på meldingskryptering og signering for denne bindingen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If there is nothing in the message that is encrypted, the signature element is not encrypted even when the MessageProtectionOrder property is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Hvis det er noe i meldingen som krypteres, er Signaturelementet ikke kryptert selv når egenskapen MessageProtectionOrder er satt til <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>

trans-unit.source: This behavior occurs even with system-provided bindings.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer selv om du har angitt system bindinger.

trans-unit.source: However the WSDL generated by [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] still contains the <`sp:EncryptSignature`> assertion.
trans-unit.target: Imidlertid WSDL generert av [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] inneholder fremdeles den `sp:EncryptSignature`> deklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: For a listing of the members and their descriptions, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil se en liste over medlemmer med beskrivelser, se <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"></xref> values that specify how the message is protected.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"> </xref> verdier som angir hvordan meldingen er beskyttet.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.MessageProtectionOrder"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value is not a valid member of the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdien er ikke et gyldig medlem av opplistingen.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the token definition for the recipient.
trans-unit.target: Angir token definisjonen for mottakeren.

trans-unit.source: This property gets and sets a class that contains the properties for the token of the party that receives the communication.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen får eller angir en klasse som inneholder egenskapene for tokenet for part som mottar kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters> that holds the token definition.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>som inneholder token definisjonen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityTokenParameters>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether message signatures must be confirmed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om meldingen signaturer må bekreftes.

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the request signatures must be confirmed as part of the response.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir om forespørselen signaturer må bekreftes som en del av svaret.

trans-unit.source: If the value is `true`, then the server includes and signs, in the response, all the signatures included in the request.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er `true`, og serveren inkluderer og logger, svar, alle signaturer som er inkludert i forespørselen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if message signatures must be confirmed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis meldingen signaturer må bekreftes; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets a value that indicates whether derived keys are required.
trans-unit.target: Angir en verdi som angir om avledede nøkler er nødvendig.

trans-unit.source: A derived key is created from an existing key and makes it possible to vary the key used in the course of a conversation.
trans-unit.target: En avledet nøkkel er opprettet fra en eksisterende nøkkel, og gjør det mulig å variere nøkkelen som brukes i løpet av en samtale.

trans-unit.source: This makes it more difficult for a hacker to decrypt the communication.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør det vanskeligere for en hacker å dekryptere kommunikasjon.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if derived keys are required; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis avledede nøkler er påkrevd. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Exports a custom policy assertion about bindings, which is added to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) information.
trans-unit.target: Eksporterer en egendefinert policy deklarasjon om bindinger, som legges til Web Services beskrivelse språket (WSDL)-informasjon.

trans-unit.source: This method writes binding-related statements into the WSDL information exposed by a particular contract and is used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to communicate to clients the existence of this custom binding element in the binding stack.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden skriver bindingen-relaterte setninger i WSDL-informasjon som vises av bestemte kontrakten og brukes av [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] å kommunisere med klienter forekomsten av egendefinerte bindingselementet i stakken binding.

trans-unit.source: This method takes two parameters: the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tar to parametere: den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext>objekter.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> methods to obtain collections of policy assertions that have already been exported at various scopes.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A>, og <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A>metoder for å hente samlinger av policydeklarasjon som allerede har blitt eksportert på forskjellige omfang.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetOperationBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetMessageBindingAssertions%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.GetBindingAssertions%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then use this method to add your own policy assertions to the appropriate collection.
trans-unit.target: Deretter Bruk denne metoden til å legge til egne policydeklarasjon riktig samlingen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A> property exposes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> for the endpoint that is being exported.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>egenskapen viser den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>for sluttpunktet som eksporteres.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext.Contract%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows this method to correctly scope their exported policy assertions.
trans-unit.target: Dette gjør at denne metoden skal være omfang riktig deres eksporterte policydeklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: For example, security attributes in code may add behaviors to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> that indicate where security policy assertions should be added.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel sikkerhetsattributter i koden kan legge til virkemåter til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>som angi der sikkerhet policydeklarasjon skal legges til.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription>

trans-unit.source: Once custom policy assertions are attached to the WSDL information, clients can detect and import the custom binding assertions by implementing an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Når egendefinerte policydeklarasjon er knyttet til WSDL-informasjonen, klienter kan oppdage og importere de egendefinerte bindingen deklarasjoner ved å implementere et <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>grensesnitt.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"></xref> that you can use to modify the exporting process.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter"> </xref> som du kan bruke til å endre eksporterer prosessen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"></xref> that you can use to insert your custom policy assertion.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext"> </xref> som du kan bruke til å sette inn egendefinert policy-deklarasjon.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en streng som representerer dette <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Information returned by ToString includes the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.MessageProtectionOrder%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RequireSignatureConfirmation%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.RecipientTokenParameters%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.AsymmetricSecurityBindingElement.InitiatorTokenParameters%2A> values of the current instance.
